creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: large olive-green circular form with slit in center overlapping black rectangular form; smaller, irregularly shaped olive green form at R edge; overlapping lime green and rust colored forms at LRQ, slightly overlapping black rectangle; short, thick black line LLQ; triangular light brown and olive green form at bottom L edge
markings: LRQ, in pencil: [32/40]; on back, bottom center, in pencil: [$115--]
signed: LRQ, in pencil: [Rikio Takahashi]; LRQ, in pencil: [Saint\'s Answer]; LRQ, in pencil: [1964]
title: Saint's Answer
